channel.title: Herp ba derp blacksmith thingy
channel.description:
Blacksmith BD,Support Unique
Passive 1:armour, immune to death once.
Day ability 1:Fortify, prevents visitors.(2 uses)
Night ability 1:tinker,pick a player, then will gain a use of night abilities,if no ability has limited functions gives message, “the target seems to have everything they need” does not give unique attacking abilities (unlimited uses)
Night ability 2:forge,gives player death immunity(2 uses)
The tinkerer Unseen, Support Unique
Passive 1:supplies,when convert give assasin death immunity once.
Day ability 1:lock pick,pick a player. They will be able to visit anyone and anyone will be able to visit him(they cannot visit jailed person,and people can still visit himin jail)(2 uses)
Night ability 1:crafty,craft item for unseen,menu pops up like alch Sword(2 uses) assasin will kill target and somebody else who visits target. Will priority being killer,support,investigative,social. Armour(1 use)gives MM immunity to death immunity passing attacks, or if assasin lost armour give assasin armour Key(1 use):give a key to a unseen member. When jailed they will not be jailed.(will remove the “you will jail x tonight when night starts to remove suspicion) Arrows(2 uses) assasins attack will not count as visit
Dont mind me, i just make things i think are cool. *leaves*

DaxJ:

immune to death once.

Don’t know why bd class needs death immunity, but ok

DaxJ:

makes anyone visiting you be blocked.

Just say prevents people from visiting you. Also 2 uses seems fine

DaxJ:

tinker,pick a player, then will gain a use of night abilities,if no ability has limited functions gives message, “the target seems to have everything they need”(unlimited uses)

Prevent uses on unique classes. Giving Hunter/prince extra abilities seems a bit op.

DaxJ:

forge,gives player death immunity(2 uses)

Don’t know why it’s named forge, try changing the name to something with armor

DaxJ:

supplies,when convert give assasin death immunity once.

Seems cool

DaxJ:

lock pick,pick a player. They will be able to visit anyone and anyone will be able to visit him(they cannot visit jailed person,and people can still visit himin jail)(2 uses)

So basically a frenzy that still lets you get occ’d, but can also be used on mm? Neat

DaxJ:

assasin will kill target and somebody else who visits target. Will priority being killer,support,investigative,social.

Cool

DaxJ:

gives MM immunity to death immunity passing attacks, or if assasin lost armour give assasin armour

1 use is good, but how would assassin have armor?

DaxJ:

give a key to a unseen member. When jailed they will not be jailed.(will remove the “you will jail x tonight when night starts to remove suspicion)

Again good it’s 1 use, cause it’s kinda op with more

DaxJ:

Arrows(2 uses) assasins attack will not count as visit

Was gonna say reduce to 1, but there’s still a chance they can die, so it’s ok.
